data.name: Treasure of Cutuma 3rd - Ruler of the blue sky
data.detailed_description:
The game is a free add-on for the base game.

About this add-on
This add-on is a collection of wallpapers from the base game.

How to appreciate
To see wallpaper collections, open the WallPaper folder in the local folder.
If you don't want this DLC, clear the DLC checkbox in the Steam app.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The game is a free add-on for the base game. This add-on is a collection of wallpapers from the base game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
